35607683.review:
I have played them all too me this one is the easiest, but that may be due to the training that I had playing the first installment to this one. lets start with what makes this a good game to me.

1.) music is good, I love it, its heavy metal zen. Definetly something I enjoy.

2.) the game although retro in graphics I didnt care one bit.

3.) sound effects, I love the sounds from the sword cutting bullets, to striking enemies, and the guns all are enjoyable and not irritating.

4.) visuals are great, from the power of the gun shaking your camera, to the splattering and spinning guns from an enemy that disintergrated. feels gloriuuuus!!!

5.) my desire to get as many points as freaking possible.

cons.

1.) I really liked in uber mosh how everytime you ranked up a little badge would appear on the shoulder plate, this and some of the others dont have that. it would have made my daay even brighter if that was back, with more ranks to make me feel even more awsome or even a kill counter on the shoulder plate.

2.) I like the narration wish there was more of it, feels great when he says the colony provides us with everything except violence! lol me want more.

3.) honestly there is no more I am a fan of this genre and for 6.99 on sale for all of them I am happy.

33789753.review:
Ubermosh: Wraith is the most difficult installment in the series. This is good for fans like myself, who breezed through the challenges in the first few games. I feel little incentive to ever go back and revisit those games, but this one really pushes me hard. Even after completing all of the challenges, I still sometimes feel like I want to play them all again.

I would've liked even more challenges, and more depth to the game, but for the low price, it's an overall satisfying experience for what it brings to the table.

I had some slowdown and minimizing screen performance issues when the field became cluttered. This didn't happen often, but when it did, it was very annoying.

Плюсы:
+ Игра будет летать на ультрах в 4к даже на пентиуме 3.
+ Прост в освоений, есть обучение
+ Есть режимы игры

= Сюжет тут... подача скажем странная.

TL;DR - Still awesome.

I've been playing UBERMOSH and UBERMOSH:BLACK before, this is my third Ubermosh purchase: it's quite my favorite, despite the small playtime (0.2hrs so far). I love the new features, I noticed that there's plenty of new game modes, some new weapons, and a completely different gameplay from UM and UM:B. Can't wait to discover more. And I still love it a damn lot.
GJ, Walt.

31239958.review: I like this game, but the game crashes when there are a lot of enemy spawns

31226188.review:
Arcade Twin Stick Shooter Fun! The game wins through its simplicity. Wraith being the first game I played of the series. Lose a lot, get better, own em all! It sharpens your reflexes. Pickup and play and have fun!

I started using a controller but found out that the analog stick used to move the crosshair always resets back to face into the lower-right corner when the stick is not pushed into a certain direction. So I tried the almighty mouse aim and it was much better to aim and shoot.
Playing with WASD is not very healthy for my hand so I combined using the analog stick for moving around while aiming with the mouse, which improved me playing the game.
In very few cases, players are plagued by framerate issues or like me by hickups, where the screen freezes for a milisecond. But I guess in 9 out of 10 cases players have a smooth experience with the game.
Maybe some of these issues can be addressed in an updated version? I still highly recommend the game if you want to kill some spare minutes.

31110938.review: I was looking for what was on sale and was pleasanty surprised when I saw a new UBERMOSH game. While it's certainly the easiest in the series, it's hardly a problem. The control has gotten tighter, a new brainclap-esque mechanic on top of brainclap, a few more guns, and a handful of new enemies really shake up the UBERMOSH formula. I'm extatic that Walter Machado has made yet another near-perfect twin stick shooter that really gets my heart pumping.

30883453.review:
[h1]高難易度アクションSTG４作目[/h1]
[url=store.steampowered.com/sub/95016/]UBERMOSHシリーズ[/url]の４作目です。
＋α的な追加要素が重ねられたこのシリーズですが、今作もその流れに沿ったものとなります。
※このシリーズが初めての方は１から始めた方がスムーズに遊べると思います。
[url=store.steampowered.com/app/515570/]UBERMOSH Vol.3[/url]からの変更点は
・雷撃の追加（時間経過で自動発動）
・強化された敵の追加（一定時間無敵＆武器強化）

雷撃の追加により、赤い粒状の敵や八方からの攻撃も
雷撃→"brainclap"のコンボで捌きやすくなりました。
ゲームの難易度は下がりましたが実績解除のハードルが上がっています。
良くも悪くも前作にアクセントを加えるだけの、これまで通りの進化であり
「UBERMOSHをもうちょっと遊びたい」そんな人の為の内容です。

[h1]低スペックPCではクリア不可…かも[/h1]
２作目の[url=store.steampowered.com/app/444940/]BLACK[/url]あたりから処理落ちが酷く、場合によっては落ちましたが
今作では実績解除の規定キル数が1200に増え、低スペPC上ではフリーズによりクリア不可でした。

30856758.review:
[h1]"Ubermosh without obstacles"[/h1]
I'm stunned how long they will keep the same game concept in so many other games. Ubermost:Wraith just adds another class the wraith which I cannot even distinguish from the psyker. The other classes are still the same. Only melee is the most challenging or only gunner. But basically I like the catalyst the most. This is where I got my highscore of 1250 pts. New is also some swarmrider groups spawn and you lightning mana burst. There are no more disturbing obstacles on the battlefield.

30852108.review: Another quality designer drug for us, pixelated gore addicts. I found this game in my library, probably because I paid for Ubermosh: vol. 3 recenty, but I of course I wouldn't hesitate to pay for any title from Ubermosh series. The balance came as close to the limit in term of "dealing max damage without spoiling the fun" as poossible, although I must admit that the game feels a bit less "hard-core" than the earlier chapters do. More, instead of "Ubermosh: Wraith" it may be as well called "Ubermosh: Revenge of Kensai" because of balance issues that occur for characters with "Better manastrike / 40 kills for brainclap" traits: manastrike leads to brainclap almost instantly. The most-specific classes (Wraith, Psyker, Kensai) are the easiest ones to play (and to get max kills per 90 secods), and Warlock is maybe the most difficult one, because it has only 2 lives, while it is possible to acquire "better equipment" in 15 seconds of play while still retaining 4 "cores" in Basic class. Addition of tough guys that require several hits is nice idea too, but is it only me who thinks that you should instantly slay them with a sword? Otherwise approaching them closer is not so rewarding.  Anyway, I would recommend this game both for newcomers and the fans, and newcomers should definitely buy this along with "Ubermosh: Black" to perfect their skills. Well done, Walter, and keep on!

30699972.review:
미친 이젠 어디까지 나올 지 기다리게 만드는 우버모쉬 시리즈의 그 4번째 작품인 [b]《우버모쉬:레이스》[/b]다. 슬슬 더 이상 생각하지 않을 때 마다 기 막힌 타이밍으로 이 시리즈가 계속 무료로 라이브러리에 생기는데, 유저 입장에서는 어쨌든 감사하긴 한데 정작 개발사는 무슨 생각으로?

 + 여전히 중독성 있는 BGM
 + 여전히 살아있는 특유의 타격감
 + 맵의 한계가 없어져서 이벤트에서 생존하기는 더 쉬워졌다
 + 다양한 모드(가 있지만 정작 다를 건 없다)
 + 쉴드를 두른 적이 이번에 새로 추가되었다(나름 신선하게 느꼈다)
 + 제일 좋은 총기를 습득하는 시간이 전작에 비해 훨씬 짧아졌다
 + 마나 스트라이크 시스템이 새로 추가

 - 음, 확실히 다른 사람 말 대로 도전과제 올클리어 하기가 더 어려워졌다(그래도 포기할 정도는 아님 ㅎ)
 
솔직히 거의 달라진 게 없다고 해도 무방하나, 아직까지는 전혀 질리지가 않는다. 특유의 타격감이 워낙 좋고, BGM이 쩔어서 그런 듯 '-' ★

30667251.review:
全成就撒花~
我真的太爱这游戏。
和前几作的玩法基本一致，本作也是取消了地图中的障碍物，地图也是无限大的。

[h1]Что тут у нас, в отличие от предыдущих частей? [/h1]

30569063.review:
This game is a masterpiece. I picked up this game today and already have survived an event once in my short period of time playing. It's so fun to play and the feel you get when you are in the middle of 50 enemies as kensai and come out unharmed is soooo good. It's new mechanics have definently bettered from the other games.

Pros: Good mechanics, small but diverse amount of guns, delfecting is reaction and intuition based as opposed to timing based, enemies can get the better of you if you dont position well, hard mode is HARD, great thematic graphics, low price, different classes bring challenge and variety, mana burst is very strong but well balanced, brain burst is so fun to chain and unleash with mana burst, very good soundtrack that gets you into the game more.

Cons: Enemies sometimes shoot weird, sometimes waiting long periods of time before shooting at you(could be just to make relfecting harder), game could prove to be too hard for casual gamers, could be more class variety, don't see a need to set mana burst to anything but circular.

Hope this helped you to a decision but I really hope you get this game I promise you will not be dissapointed.

30484944.review:
It's always nice to see a new volume of Ubermosh released, because though each game is a tweaked version of the next, the tweaks and fine handling are what really make the game.
1. Adjustable manastrike is a nice addition, feels a bit more dynamic to use than the brainclap of earlier versions.
2. Shielded enemies make for a slightly increased challenge, but you pretty much just ought to run away.
3. 2nd best gun spawn time earlier? Feels like you get it faster than previously.
4. Good soundtrack additions, feels pretty badass when loading in for a PR run.
5. The lack of terrain is a good design choice over earlier Ubermosh volumes, but would like to see an occasional obstacle (in the last 10 seconds it's possible to ignore the screen as you pray for enough kills if you have the best gun and a good spray pattern.)

Most I would recommend for a new volume is a new gun or two, with slightly more varied mechanics than "more bullets and more spray."

30479909.review: kanser oldum amk oyna oyna yüksek score yapıcam diye diye sabahlar olmuş.

30416586.review:
Продолжение серии игр UBERMOSH, UBERMOSH:BLACK и UBERMOSH Vol.3.

Для тех, кто не в теме, это неплохая аркада - стрелялка с видом сверху, графоном в ретро стиле и динамичной музыкой. В игре нет ни смысла, ни сюжета, ни конца. 
Играя за кибер ниндзю нужно уничтожить как можно больше врагов за отведённое время.
В арсенале есть только меч и пушки, которые можно собирать с убитых врагов.  

Игра повторяет третью часть UBERMOSH Vol.3. с некоторыми изменениями.
- В игру добавили новый класс Wraith. 
- Добавили Manastrike, в случайном порядке испускаемая персонажем молния, массово уничтожающая врагов в округе.
- Добавили нового врага с силовым щитом, который нельзя пробить. Щит исчезает сам через короткий промежуток времени.
- В два раза повысили планку очков, необходимых для получения достижений, из-за чего их стало сложнее получить.

30363605.review: Essa é a versão mais "ranca toco" de ubermosh! Massa demais!

30312670.review:
Great game in short bursts, you're basically playing a horde-survival type match that takes 90 seconds. Each class has 2-6 hit points (any damage you take is worth 1 hit point) as well as some other gameplay extras. Die, and you start over. It's a hard game at first, but once you get the rhythm down, you'll be mowing down enemies with ease. 
The only real criticism I have, is that the enemy bullets, and the smaller enemies themselves, can be difficult to see near the end of the game, as each kill leaves a bright blood pool on the ground, which can cover half the screen as the player gets snowball effect going with the kills. Possibly this is intentional? As the player tends to move away from the blood in order to see. 
For 2€ the game is an absolute steal. Pick it up, play it every now and then for maybe 10 minutes at a time, you won't regret buying.

30138942.review:
우버모쉬의 3번째 후속작 분노입니다.
여전히 하드코어한 게임을 좋아하는 당신에게 추천합니다.
여전히 빠른 페이스의 전투,  찰진 타격감과 미칠듯한 와리가리에서 드디어 넓은 시야로 한발짝 내디뎠더니 브레인클램의 연발과 신규 시스템인 번개설사의 눈뽕에 미치는 자신을 볼 수 있다.
번개를 싸지르는 신규 시스템인 마나스트라이크는 앞/뒤/사방 셋 중 하나의 방향성을 가지고 적들을 초토화시키는데, 
이런 기술력이면 걍 번개로 다 지져버리면 될것을 왜 굳이 무섭게 생긴 아지매들을 데려다놓고 쌈박질을 시켜야하는지 영문을 모르겠다. 
우버모쉬의 세계에도 우리나라의 유서깊은 문화 중 하나인 군납비리가 존재하는걸까?
아무렴 우리에게 새로운 초능력이 주어졌다는 것은 전혀 나쁜게 아니죠. 새로운 컬러링의 주인공, 존나 쏀 더블 초능력, 탄막과 레이저 사무라이칼로 적을 자르고 부수고 난도질할 수 있으니 더할 나위 없이 좋습니다.
물론 보호막 친 씨부랄놈이 총들고 개기기 전까진 말입니다.
아니 1티어총도 못먹었는데 벌써 저 놈이 왜 나와 운빨총망겜 십발

30107267.review:
無印UBERMOSHと、そのスタンドアローン拡張BLACK、Vol.3に続く4つめ。
Vol.3をベースに広範囲に派手な電撃を発するようになりました。
電撃は定期的に自動で出るため、タイミングが合う時と合わない時で結果がだいぶ変わる大雑把なゲームバランスになったように感じます。
頭の中で次の電撃までをカウントダウンしながら位置・方向を考えるという前作までとは異なった戦い方はバリエーションのひとつとしてはアリだと思いますが、煩わしくもあるので、私はVol.3の方が好きですね。
無印とBLACKは上下移動中に画面外から現れた敵に殺されゲーでしたが、Vol.3とこのWRAITHでは視界を広くすることで改善が図られています。

29996352.review:
I have beaten the game in one hour exactly!

The difference from the original ubermosh
-Psyonic mana explosions from time to time in addition to the burst from the 2nd game.
-Endless maps and nowhere to hide like in the 3rd game
-Mana oriented class
-Improved version of the red shotgun - green shotgun with golden bullets.
-Swarm of flying bullets chasing you from time to time

Everything else is the same:
STEP - 1 - Drop into the battlefield
STEP - 2 - Find the red shotgun ASAP
STEP - 3 - Find the green shotgun ASAP
STEP - 4 - http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=866193440

29752247.review: Easily the best game in this awesome series, and the developer seemingly gave it out for free since I owned the previous games (it just showed up in my library), which is classy behavior. Vol 3 is probably better as a technical score attack game because the mana charge added in Wraith feels a bit random and makes the full round much easier to survive, but Wraith is way more fun to play on every level and is thus the definitive version of the game.

29704715.review: Финальная работа разработчика в рамках этой серии, и очередная доза веселого адреналина без сюжета и гор текста для нетребовательных к графике и терпимых к такого рода играм игроков. Автор явно вдохновлялся киберпанк мангой и постапокалипсисом. Сюжет умещается в одном предложении: мы на развлекательной арене в постутопическом будующем. Музыка простая, но очень в тему -- отдает сёрф-роком + электроклешем с кусочками инопланетной кислоты. Грань управления: механика боя еще более остра, конечно требует привыкания для первого раза. Ачивки, пожалуй, слишком просты, но целевая аудитория жаждет. Ждем новых игр, друзья :steamhappy:

29610916.review:
I initially had some problems when first trying out the game but thankfully it's all been fixed now. That's a sign of a great game developer right there, one who helps fix the problems of the games as well as making new games. Have I already mentioned that I admire and respect Walter Machado as a game developer?

But now that I've had chance to play properly, I can safely say that WRAITH is even better than before. You've still got the classic UBERMOSH gameplay of 90 seconds in the arena to gun down as many enemies as possible, but now you've got the 'Manastrike', a move that sets off at random intervals to wipe out even more enemies, as well as a return of the brainclap and the open arena.

All I can say is that this takes all the best parts of the series and brings it all together in one juicy package and adds new extras and new achievements. And new music! As well as the familiar soundtrack, we've got some new songs to mosh to! Just makes gunning those enemies down even more fun.

The only downside is that there can be some occasional slowdown when there's a lot going on (though that may be because my computer isn't all that powerful) but this doesn't detract from the experience. This is still stupidly good fun.

If this is the last installment of the UBERMOSH series, then I certainly look forward to more of Walter Machado's future projects (and if you haven't already, check out Trip to Vinelands).

All in all, this had everything I could expect in an UBERMOSH game, and more. Although I would love to hear more on the lore of the UBERMOSH world!

Ubermosh, um simples jogo indie, começou como uma ideia de um hack'n'slash sem nenhum tipo de 'Farming' (Se bem que se tu procurar guias na comunidade, tem algums jeitos de 'farmar'), chega a sua quarta edição, e....
Melhor jogar os primeiros e adquirir um pouco de habilidade antes de lutar nos grandes desertos de Ultakaar. na (Provavél) forma final desse maravilhoso jogo.
E para aqueles que já lutaram nos desertos de Ultakaar... Boa sorte.
